summary: The gritty true-life story of a notorious Boston criminal and his gang who, driven by addiction and greed, commit a series of dangerous robberies during the height of the OxyContin drug trade.
cast: Damien Di Paola|Johnny Hickey|Tim Sylvia|David Burns|Patty Ross|Brendan Brennan|Mercy Rincon|Christian Trotta|Jim Cullity|Anthony Paolucci|Benny Frangioso|Richard DeAgazio|Jon Saphire|Gennaro Riccio|Chris Pereira|Stephanie Lemelin|Dale F. Appel|Bernie Auch|Josh Barns|James Barrett|Brina|Lyndon Byers|Dave Duseau|Robert Evans|Johnny Gagliardi|Mateo Gallo|Barry Gaughran|Ryan Gillis|Emeka Joseph Ihedigbo|Desmond Keough|Brian Lewis|Robert Lewis|Steven Lewis|Jennifer Lyons|Michele McPhee|Jason Mulcahy|William Parker|Stephen Passacantilli|Sherman Pendergarst|Christopher Pereira|Giovanni Picariello|John Quilter|Ifádansi Rashad|Sean P. Rea|Tracie Reilly|Seth Malvín Romero|Michael Dello Russo|Kristina Stokes|Domenic Ventresca|Malik Williams|Brian Douglas Young|Diana Afonso|Christopher J. Davis|Jayne Costello Goode|Brett Gustafson
title: Oxy-Morons
